formatting_rules: Use lowercase to start sentences for a more authentic, conversational tone.
Incorporate personal reflections and realizations to build relatability.
Avoid excessive capitalization or punctuation for a balanced, professional look.
Opt for simple, succinct phrasing over lengthy, flowery language.
Maintain a subtle, understated tone rather than overly dramatic or emotive language.
emotional_triggers: Curiosity and the desire to learn
